mapper.select: SELECT A.BBS_NO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.IP, A.CREATED_AT, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT BBS_NO, WRITER, TITLE, IP, CREATED_AT, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM BBS) A ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS( WRITER , TITLE , IP , CREATED_AT , STATE , DEPTH , GROUP_ORDER ) VALUES ( #{writer} , #{title} , #{ip} , NOW() , 1 , 0 , 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS SET GROUP_ORDER = GROUP_ORDER + 1 WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND GROUP_ORDER > #{groupOrder}
